About.paragraph: Tyche Games is built on a cross-chain smart protocol based on the Terra blockchain. Our mission is to build a decentralized casual game platform with broad participation, in which both players and game creators can benefit, fully experience the benefits of web 3.0 and Gamefi. At the same time, Tyche Games is committed to providing a powerful GameFi platform for the Terra ecosystem, combining the advantages of Terra's financial system, using an efficient and practical tokenomics to empower Tyche Games platform games, and providing blockchain game users and game creators. The game form of play to earn. We hope that with the rise of Gamefi, Meta and Defi, Tyche Games and Terra ecosystem will be combined to become a game platform with millions of users in the Web3.0.

Features.title: Decentralized
Features.text: Tyche Games integrates blockchain finance and gameplay, combines DeFi and NFT to build a Web 3.0-based decentralized game platform, and generates an aggregation platform that can connect many games through core smart contracts.

Features.title: Play to Earn
Features.text: Players can get rewards by playing games and holding tokens on the entire platform of Tyche Games, allowing users to earn income while enjoying the fun of the game.

Features.title: DAO
Features.text: Carrying forward the spirit of blockchain decentralization, the Tyche Games Fund is autonomously governed by the DAO community, and important decisions require community voting to truly achieve community autonomy.

Features.title: CrossChain
Features.text: Based on the Terra blockchain, Tyche Games will implement a cross-chain bridge mechanism, and assets from other chains can also quickly enter Tyche Games to participate in the game experience and gain game incentives.
